title: DEATHLOOP (Epic Games) Giveaway
description: Are you ready to brake the loop? Score DEATHLOOP for free on Epic Games Store! DEATHLOOP is a popular first person shooter from Arkane Lyon, the studio behind Dishonored.
instructions:
1. Click the "Get Giveaway" button to visit the giveaway page.
2. Login into your Epic Games Store account.
3. Click the button to add the game to your library

title: Ogu and the Secret Forest (Epic Games) Giveaway
description: Explore the world with baby Ogu today! Claim Ogu and the Secret Forest on Epic Games Store for free! Ogu and the Secret Forest is a 2D adventure game with hand-drawn characters and lots of puzzles.
instructions:
1. Click the "Get Giveaway" button to visit the giveaway page.
2. Login into your Epic Games Store account.
3. Click the button to add the game to your library

title: Fall Guys - Digi Costume Giveaway
description: Playing Fall Guys? Claim your free Digi Costume and stand out in style!
instructions:
1. If you don't already have an Epic Games account, create one.
2. Then install Fall Guys (free-to-play) through the Epic Games Store.
3. Visit the offer page and click the "Add To Cart" button to claim this add-on.

title: Rocket League - TriTrim Wheels Giveaway
description: Claim your free Rocket League - TriTrim Wheels via Epic Games Store! Please note the base game Rocket League (free-to-play) is required to enjoy this add-on content.
instructions:
1. If you don't already have an Epic Games account, create one.
2. Then install Rocket League (free-to-play) through the Epic Games Store.
3. Visit the offer page and click the "Add To Cart" button to claim this add-on.
